name: Dealer development coordinator
description:
JOB SUMMARY

Develop AGCO dealer network in Russia to meet the growth aspirations of the AGCO brands in line with AGCO strategy. Implement performance improvement programs contributing to profitability and dynamic development of the network. Implement global AGCO projects and systems aimed on dealer performance improvement.

The role directly reports to Head of distribution management Russia.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Support development and implementation of distribution strategy on Russian market.
  • Coordinate dealer performance evaluation and improvement processes which includes interaction with other depts in Europe and Moscow office
  • Dealer performance monitoring and analysis in frames of regular assessment procedures as well occasional “deep dive” studies
  • Collect, analyze, and present to management necessary information about dealers (performance reviews) or candidates (dealer selection process)
  • Support appointment and termination process of distribution partners
  • Facilitate new dealer market entrance and ensure compliance to dealer standards including visual identity of outlets
  • Support in development and implementation of training programs for dealer’s management and field force in close interaction with European office and local Training Centre
  • Assist in selection and management of 3-rd party suppliers (training providers, consultancy agencies)
  • Support global processes and systems implementation on Russian market: responsible for data feed to central teams and compliance to global Distribution procedures
  • Maintain and coordinate internal and dealer accounts management procedures and contract management
  • Administration of other activities which have an impact on the quality and performance of the AGCO Distribution network in Russia

JOB REQUIREMENTS

Education & Experience

  • Bachelor’s degree, preferably engineering or technical sciences
  • 2-5 years of professional experience preferably in special machinery, automotive or consulting
  • Coordination roles and proven success in cross functional projects
  • Fluent Oral/Written English communication skills
  • Good presentation skills
  • High degree of PC literacy with Microsoft Office including high skills in MS PowerPoint and MS Excel

Qualifications

The knowledge, skills and/or ability required.

  • Analytical and structured set of mind
  • Strong interpersonal skills in building relationships, sensitivity, empathy
  • Self-management in managing stress, time and work, self-starting, learning
  • Results orientated and able to translate objectives into effective action plans with minimum of supervision
  • Willingness to learn
  • Readiness for several - day business trips
